data.name: Westpac  Online Investment Loan
data.description: Designed for direct investors, and integrated with a Westpac Share Trading account, our simplified margin loan may help you build a diversified share portfolio.

features.additionalInfo: Available for Individuals and joint borrowers.

Interest : Receive preferential variable and fixed rates.Interest and other costs could be tax deductible. It may be possible to bring forward a tax deduction by prepaying interest. Prepaying your interest before the end of the financial year can help you manage your cashflow.

Loan-to-Value Ratio (LVRs): The LVR determines the amount Westpac Online Investment Loan will let you borrow against an individual security. With Westpac Online Investment Loan, LVRs are up to 75%, depending on the particular security.
Minimum loan amount : No transaction limits, no minimum amounts for loan drawdowns or repayments.

Tools to manage your loan : Monitor and transact on your loan account online 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. The complete picture of your borrowings and shares in the one place Specialist Investment Loan Customer Service available Monday to Friday, 8.00am to 6.30pm (Sydney time) on 1300 551 744.

Key risks include : While borrowing to invest in shares and managed funds increases your potential returns, it can also increase potential losses. In a volatile market, the value of your investment loan portfolio may fall to a level where it no longer provides adequate security for your investment loan and can trigger a margin call. If this happens you will be required to bring your loan balance back under your borrowing limit.The margin loan is a full recourse loan - even if the value of your security portfolio falls to zero, you are still liable to repay the total loan balance outstanding. We recommend you seek independent financial and taxation advice before acting on this information. Please refer to the Westpac Online Investment Product Disclosure Statement for more information.
Your loan facility will consist of a variable interest rate loan and you may request any number of fixed interest rate loans.
Fixed interest rates are available for terms ranging from 3 months to 5 years

Interest Payment Options : Variable interest can either be paid by direct debit or capitalised to the loan (subject to you having sufficient Funds available). Fixed interest can either be paid by direct debit, BPAY, direct credit or capitalised to the loan.
No regular repayments are required provided your outstanding loan balance remains at or below your Borrowing Limit and Credit Limit.
Buffer : To ensure that small fluctuations in the market value of your security do not trigger a Margin Call, a 10% Buffer is applied to the market value of each Acceptable security.

features.additionalValue: Margin Call Alerts : You can choose to be alerted via SMS or email (or both) if your margin loan nears or has reached a Margin call.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Applicant should be 18 years or over
Investors who are Individuals or joint individual
Investors who are not holders of a Significant Investor Visa (188C)
